name: freelance-management-system
description: A comprehensive freelance management system with NestJS API and React TypeScript frontend

scripts.dev:api: cd api && PORT=3000 npm run start:dev
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:frontend

author: Gabriel Araujo
